title: Awesome List Updates on Aug 08, 2024
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Aug 08, 2024 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Angular
items.content_text: ### HTTP / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies) * [ng-http-loader (⭐350)](https://github.com/mpalourdio/ng-http-loader) - Smart Angular HTTP interceptor - Intercepts automagically HTTP requests and shows a spinkit spinner / loader / progress bar. ### Internationalization / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies) * [intl-tel-input-ng (⭐18)](https://github.com/mpalourdio/intl-tel-input-ng) - An Angular component to easily integrate [intl-tel-input (⭐8k)](https://github.com/jackocnr/intl-tel-input). ### Images / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies) * [@unpic/angular](https://unpic.pics/img/angular/) - Angular directive for responsive, high-performance images. Generates a responsive `` tag that follows best practices, with the correct srcset, sizes and styles. Detects image URLs from most image CDNs and CMSs and can resize images with no build step.
items.content_html:
HTTP / Google Developer Experts

  • ng-http-loader (⭐350) - Smart Angular HTTP interceptor - Intercepts automagically HTTP requests and shows a spinkit spinner / loader / progress bar.

Internationalization / Google Developer Experts

  • intl-tel-input-ng (⭐18) - An Angular component to easily integrate intl-tel-input (⭐8k).

Images / Google Developer Experts

  • @unpic/angular - Angular directive for responsive, high-performance images. Generates a responsive <img> tag that follows best practices, with the correct srcset, sizes and styles. Detects image URLs from most image CDNs and CMSs and can resize images with no build step.

items.title: Awesome Browser Extensions for Github
items.content_text: ### [GitHub Red Issues (⭐42)](https://github.com/KatsuteDev/GitHub-Red-Issues) Revert closed GitHub issues from purple back to red Installs: 1 | Stars: 39 | Last update: 8 Aug 2024
items.content_html:
GitHub Red Issues (⭐42)

Revert closed GitHub issues from purple back to red

Installs: 1 | Stars: 39 | Last update: 8 Aug 2024

items.title: Awesome Zsh Plugins
items.content_text:
### Plugins / [superconsole](https://github.com/alexchmykhalo/superconsole) - Windows-only

*   [popman (⭐4)](https://github.com/jdsee/popman) - Ever found yourself in the middle of composing a long command and needing to check a man page? Popman lets you instantly pop open a man page for any command you're typing and jump right back to where you left off, making your command-line experience smoother and more efficient.

### Completions / [superconsole](https://github.com/alexchmykhalo/superconsole) - Windows-only

*   [web-search (⭐3)](https://github.com/GowayLee/zsh_web_search) - Runs a search in the specified search engine in your default browser.
items.content_html:
Plugins / superconsole - Windows-only

  • popman (⭐4) - Ever found yourself in the middle of composing a long command and needing to check a man page? Popman lets you instantly pop open a man page for any command you're typing and jump right back to where you left off, making your command-line experience smoother and more efficient.

Completions / superconsole - Windows-only

  • web-search (⭐3) - Runs a search in the specified search engine in your default browser.

items.title: Awesome Developer First
items.content_text:
### Scraping

*   [browserless](https://browserless.io) - Browser automation deployed to the cloud. [![browserless](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/browserless/browserless?style=flat-square\&logo=github\&labelColor=%230D1117\&color=%23161B22)](https://github.com/browserless/browserless)
*   [ZenRows](https://www.zenrows.com/) - Web scraping API with built-in proxies and rotating IPs to avoid detection.
items.content_html:
Scraping

  • browserless - Browser automation deployed to the cloud.
  • ZenRows - Web scraping API with built-in proxies and rotating IPs to avoid detection.
